name: Crash Course (JBroook)
description:
CRASH COURSE

*THIS GAME WAS MADE FOR  THE 2021 BRACKEYS GAME JAM*

In Crash Course, you play as a space craft pilot, defending our galaxy's citizens from heaps of dangerous space debris!

Call in backup and RAM your ship through dangerous objects to destroy them!

The more backup you have, the stronger you get! 

But beware! Backup slows you down!

A short game made by JBroook.
